meanings: [대단히] very, very much, greatly, extremely, exceedingly, excessively, terribly, awfully, [호되게] severely, harshly, hard, [격렬하게] violently, intensely, badly, [난폭하게] outrageously.
be taken with a fit of coughing

examples.korean: The ship was rolling heavily to and fro. 발음듣기 배가 앞뒤로 심하게 요동을 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship was rolling heavily to and fro. 발음

examples.korean: The car’s paintwork is badly scratched. 발음듣기 그 자동차의 도장 부분이 심하게 긁혀 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car’s paintwork is badly scratched. 발음

examples.korean: It was raining heavily and visibility was poor. 발음듣기 비가 심하게 내려서 시계가 좋지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was raining heavily and visibility was poor. 발음

examples.korean: She stumbled and gave her ankle a painful wrench. 발음듣기 그녀는 비틀거리며 발목을 심하게 접질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stumbled and gave her ankle a painful wrench. 발음

examples.korean: He was assailed with fierce blows to the head. 발음듣기 그는 머리를 여러 차례 몹시 심하게 두드려 맞았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was assailed with fierce blows to the head. 발음
